keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning to ensure that Sandwell benefits from the Government’s increased NHS investment.
Working to improve public transport for Sandwell, including delivering the expansion of the Metro network regionally, with more stops in Sandwell.
Promoting a strong “brownfield first” approach with Andy Street to building and providing more homes.
Campaigning to ensure Sandwell receives its fair share of the additional 366 police officers that are being recruited in the next year.
Regenerating our town centres. Town centres like Wednesbury and Great Bridge are struggling and need fresh ideas to make them thrive again.
Fighting to secure our fair share of the extra £14 billion promised for schools, ensuring that young people in Sandwell get the best possible start in life.
